name: Curfew (itch)
description:
A small game created for the first week of the #chroniclesjam!

In this game, you have to escape the Demon that's hunting you for long enough to collect 100 brimstones - you can use these to banish the Demon back to its hellish world.

But beware, the Demon is much faster in the night, so be sure to get inside when the dark falls; you won't survive long after twilight.

Controls

WASD to move.

E to collect brimstone, sleep near house

ESC to exit game
